description: Heap Free Memory Threshold has been crossed

event.Summary: Heap free memory ($v5 bytes) crossed the threshold ($v4 bytes) on shelf $v3

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD ADTRAN-GENPROCESSES-MIB::adGenProcessesHeapFreeThreshCrossed ADTRAN-GENTRAPINFORM-MIB::adTrapInformSeqNum i 9999 SNMPv2-MIB::sysName s EXAMPLE ADTRAN-GENSLOT-MIB::adGenSlotInfoIndex i 9999 ADTRAN-GENPROCESSES-MIB::adGenProcessesProvHeapFreeThreshold u 9999 ADTRAN-GENPROCESSES-MIB::adGenProcessesMemStatHeapFree u 9999

description: The sequence number included in the last trap originated by
this device. This can be used to confirm receipt of the
latest traps. Not needed by SNMPv2 Informs.
variables.name: ADTRAN-GENTRAPINFORM-MIB::adTrapInformSeqNum

description: An administratively-assigned name for this managed
node. By convention, this is the node's fully-qualified
domain name. If the name is unknown, the value is
the zero-length string.
variables.name: SNMPv2-MIB::sysName

description: A unique value for each slot. Its value may exceed
the value of adGenSlotNumber if pseudo slot numbers
are used for some bank commons or multiplexers.
This object is visible for all rows.
variables.name: ADTRAN-GENSLOT-MIB::adGenSlotInfoIndex

description: This variable specifies a threshold (in bytes) for the minimum free memory
in the heap. Below this setting an alarm will be raised.
A value of 0 will disable the alarm.
variables.name: ADTRAN-GENPROCESSES-MIB::adGenProcessesProvHeapFreeThreshold

description: The total heap memory free (in bytes). Equal to
adGenProcessesMemStatHeapSize - adGenProcessesMemStatHeapUsed
variables.name: ADTRAN-GENPROCESSES-MIB::adGenProcessesMemStatHeapFree

description: Thread Starvation Alarm Clear - epilogue_main CPU usage
and IDLE percentage are within normal limits.

event.Summary: Thread Starvation threshold within the limits on shelf $v3

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD ADTRAN-GENPROCESSES-MIB::adGenProcessesStarvationAlarmClr ADTRAN-GENTRAPINFORM-MIB::adTrapInformSeqNum i 9999 SNMPv2-MIB::sysName s EXAMPLE ADTRAN-GENSLOT-MIB::adGenSlotInfoIndex i 9999

description: A unique value for each slot. Its value may exceed
the value of adGenSlotNumber if pseudo slot numbers
are used for some bank commons or multiplexers.
This object is visible for all rows.
variables.name: ADTRAN-GENSLOT-MIB::adGenSlotInfoIndex

description: Thread Starvation Alarm Active - epilogue_main CPU usage
and IDLE percentage have crossed starvation thresholds.

event.Summary: Thread Starvation threshold crossed on shelf $v3

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD ADTRAN-GENPROCESSES-MIB::adGenProcessesStarvationAlarmAct ADTRAN-GENTRAPINFORM-MIB::adTrapInformSeqNum i 9999 SNMPv2-MIB::sysName s EXAMPLE ADTRAN-GENSLOT-MIB::adGenSlotInfoIndex i 9999
